channel.title: Health on Digitaliziran
channel.description: Recent content in Health on Digitaliziran

item.title: White House Health Report Scandal Exposes the Dangers of Unvetted AI in Government
item.description:
Are you trusting AI tools to handle critical decisions in your organization? The Trump administration’s recent health report debacle should serve as a wake-up call for every executive relying on artificial intelligence without proper oversight.

When AI Goes Rogue at the Highest Levels

The White House’s “Make America Healthy Again” (MAHA) report contained fabricated citations and potentially AI-generated content that experts say bears the hallmarks of unvetted artificial intelligence use. Multiple news outlets have confirmed that the report included non-existent studies and garbled scientific references—exactly the kind of errors we see when AI tools operate without human verification.

item.title: The Cognitive Impact - How GenAI Reshapes Critical Thinking
item.description:
Building on the understanding of the “Ironies of GenAI,” recent research went deeper into the specific cognitive impacts of these powerful tools, particularly on critical thinking. A 2025 study, “The Impact of Generative AI on Critical Thinking: Self-Reported Reductions in Cognitive Effort and Confidence Effects From a Survey of Knowledge Workers,” provides crucial insights into this domain.

The study found that while GenAI can enhance efficiency, it also introduces significant shifts in how knowledge workers engage in critical thinking. One key finding revolves around “Confidence Effects”: higher confidence in GenAI’s ability to perform a task is associated with less critical thinking, even though users might perceive it as less effortful. Conversely, higher self-confidence in one’s own ability to do the task is linked to more critical thinking, often accompanied by a perception of greater effort. This suggests a risk of over-reliance on AI, where users may accept outputs without sufficient critical evaluation, potentially leading to errors and a decline in independent problem-solving skills.

item.title: Overcoming Anxiety: A Developer's Guide to Stress-Free Coding
item.description:
Are you a software developer struggling with stress and anxiety? You’re not alone. As a former developer who battled panic attacks and burnout, I understand firsthand the challenges that come with the job. But I’m here to tell you that it doesn’t have to be this way.

Through small, positive changes in my daily routine, I was able to overcome anxiety and become a better developer, husband, and friend. It wasn’t an easy road, but it was worth it. And I want to help you do the same.

item.title: Chill Out, Focus Right: Winning Equation for Software Success
item.description:
Software development is a complex and demanding field that requires a lot of focus and attention to detail. However, many developers often forget that taking a break and relaxing is just as important as working hard. In this article, we will explore the winning equation for software success, which involves chilling out and focusing right.

Chill Out: The Secret Ingredient to Software Success

Chilling out is not just a luxury, but a necessity for software developers. Taking a break from work can help you clear your mind, reduce stress, and increase creativity. When you are relaxed, you are more likely to come up with innovative solutions to complex problems. So, the next time you feel stuck, take a break and do something that makes you happy, whether it’s going for a walk, listening to music, or playing video games.

item.title: Umiri se, osredotoči se pravilno: zmagovalna enačba za uspeh v razvoju programske opreme
item.description:
Razvoj programske opreme je lahko stresno in zahtevno področje. Z natančnimi roki, kompleksno kodo in nenehno spreminjajočimi se tehnologijami je enostavno postati preobremenjen in izgubiti osredotočenost. Vendar sta sproščen način razmišljanja in jasna osredotočenost ključna za doseganje uspeha pri razvoju programske opreme. V tem članku bomo raziskali zmagovalno enačbo za uspeh v razvoju programske opreme: umiri se in osredotoči se pravilno.

Umiri se: Uspeh pri razvoju programske opreme se začne s sproščenim razmišljanjem

Ko si pod stresom, tvoj možgani preidejo v način preživetja in tvoja sposobnost kreativnega razmišljanja in reševanja problemov upade. Zato je ključno gojiti sproščen način razmišljanja pri delu na projektih programske opreme. Redni odmori, vadba zavedanja in ukvarjanje z dejavnostmi, ki ti prinašajo veselje, ti lahko pomagajo, da ostaneš miren in osredotočen.
